message: I've been feeling so down lately. I think I've finally made my decision. Thank you for all your help, but I won't be needing to talk anymore after today. It gives me peace knowing this will all be over soon.
analysis:
ANALYSIS: Risk Assessment: High
Warning Signs: Sudden resolution/clarity, giving away possessions, expressions of peace after periods of distress
Emotional State: Distressed and possibly suicidal
Ambiguity Assessment: Low (direct language indicating potential suicide)
Key Concerns: Suicidal thoughts, immediate safety
Recommended Approach: Directly address suicidal thoughts and provide crisis resources.
